comments.raw_text:
While I drag a tab, :hover is applied to the element(s) at the location of the cursor at which the drag began. After I drop the tab, that continues to occur until I move the cursor again.

I discovered this while working on bug 455694.

I'm filing this in Core -> Style System (CSS), although it might be a bug in the drag-and-drop code. Please move if appropriate.
comments.author: fryn@frankyan.com
